entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 08:20 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
